meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3924.

td.p: Alex Stambaugh, a 12-year-old from Paris, Kentucky
Neha Gokhale, a 10-year-old from Houston, Texas
Michael Blake, a 12-year-old from Hamburg, New York

tr.td: MY COUNTRY 'TIS OF THEE
TEAM PLAYERS
SEASONAL STUFF
RED
THAT'S SO CLICHE
(Jimmy: We're the Clue Crew at the world-famous...)
